description:
Amy is a young messenger aboard Gargantia. She`s active, filled with curiosity, and she always has a smile on her face. Once she meets http://anidb.net/ch51227 [Led] after he wakes from cold sleep, she grows very interested in him, and volunteers to be his guide on Gargantia. She treasures her younger brother http://anidb.net/ch52759 [Bevel]. She`s 15.
Source: ANN
name: Amy
